welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thame, a charming town in the heart of United Kingdom known for its historical landmarks and picturesque countryside. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Thame has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Brize Norton Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Brize Norton Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium Wi-Fi is also available for purchase.
